item.description:
FREE Paranormal Investigation Class/ Haunted Dinner
When
Saturday, February 27, 2010 2:00 PM 20100227T190000Z
Details

If you are new to paranormal investigations or just want to brush up on your skills, please join us for a Paranormal Investigation 101 class, followed by an investigation of a historic building with a reputation for being paranormally active. Afterward, we*ll head to a nearby pub for dinner and discussion of the investigation. IMPORTANT: When you register, please say whether or not you will be going to dinner, so that I have an accurate count for the dinner reservations.

This is a joint meetup, for Footprints Paranormal and Central MA Wiccan meetups, and spaces are limited, so I encourage you to register soon. If you want to attend and don*t have an opportunity to do so this time, please let me know, so that I can plan another class later in the year.

Details

Class will cover the following:

* Introduction (current theories on what is a ghost, types of hauntings,
etc.)
* Do*s and don*ts for investigations
* How to prepare for and conduct an investigation (note: we will not be covering how to do a formal investigation of a client*s private residence--it is beyond the scope of this class)
* Protection (how to ground yourself and keep yourself safe during an
investigation)
* Equipment basics (includes practice with basic equipment)
* Q and A

Investigation:
We'll be investigating the second floor of a large historic building in Sturbridge. The location does not have electricity or heat, so dress warmly.

What to bring:
Flashlight (mandatory)
Notepad for recording information during the investigation Any equipment you already own (for example, voice recorder, camera)

Time:
Class 2-5pm
Investigation 5-6:30pm

Class location:
Cornerstone Creations
548 Main Street
Fiskdale, MA 01518 (a part of Sturbridge)
(508) 347-0888

Parking:
Parking is available at the Copper Stallion parking lot, a few doors down the street, or at Sturbridge Marketplace, across the street from Cornerstone.

Dinner will be at the Whistling Swan, which is right near Pete's and where the haunted investigation is going to be, you can check out their website at:

http://www.thewhistli....

This place is also haunted, with recent ghostly activity reported recently.

Though the class is limited due to space, if you are interested in joining us for dinner, please
email Tala at: talawolf7@webtv.net by Thursday, Feb 25th for reservations.
item.name: FREE Paranormal Investigation Class/ Haunted Dinner
